name: Madman Lugos
ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by twice the number of damaged enemies.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by twice the number of damaged enemies.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: WAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!!

name: Svanrige Tuirseach
ability: Deploy: Boost self by the base power of the last non-Neutral unit that went to your graveyard this round.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by the base power of the last non-Neutral unit that went to your graveyard this round.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.

name: Donar an Hindar
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Damage an enemy unit by 4 instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Bloodthirst 2: Damage an enemy unit by 4 instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
flavor: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.

name: Skjall
ability: Berserk 5: Destroy self.
ability_html: Berserk 5: Destroy self.
keyword_html: Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
flavor: Strike his name from the Saga of Elders! No one dare grant him shelter or sustenance!

name: Udalryk an Brokvar
ability: Order (Berserk 7): Set an enemy unit's power to match own power.
ability_html: Order (Berserk 7): Set an enemy unit's power to match own power.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
flavor: The gods have spoken: a sacrifice is required.

name: Giant Boar
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 1 for each damaged unit.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by the amount a unit is damaged.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Boost self by 1 for each damaged unit. Deploy (Ranged): Boost self by the amount a unit is damaged.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Most men, seeing a massive boar in the woods, mess their trousers and scurry up the nearest tree. A Skelliger, though - he just drools.

name: An Craite Raiders
ability:
Veteran.
Deploy (Bloodthirst 3): Gain Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 2.
ability_html: Veteran. Deploy (Bloodthirst 3): Gain Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 2.
keyword_html: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Cabbage, really? It’s just the worst when there’s nothing good to plunder.

name: Freya's Blessing
ability: Play a bronze non-Neutral unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
ability_html: Play a bronze non-Neutral unit from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
keyword_html: Doomed: Status that removes the card from the game after it leaves the battlefield.
flavor: Modron Freya, the Great Mother, is the goddess of love, beauty and bounty.

name: An Craite Longship
ability: Melee: Whenever your opponent plays a unit on their side of the battlefield, damage it by 1.
ability_html: Melee: Whenever your opponent plays a unit on their side of the battlefield, damage it by 1.
keyword_html: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
flavor: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.

name: An Craite Raiders
ability:
Veteran.
Deploy (Bloodthirst 3): Gain Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 2.
ability_html: Veteran. Deploy (Bloodthirst 3): Gain Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 2.
keyword_html: Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Cabbage, really? It’s just the worst when there’s nothing good to plunder.

name: Gutting Slash
ability:
Damage a unit by 4.
Bloodthirst 2: Damage by 6 instead.
ability_html: Damage a unit by 4. Bloodthirst 2: Damage by 6 instead.
keyword_html: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
flavor: Man or tree, a Skelligan axe fells it all the same.

name: Heymaey Spearmaiden
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then damage self by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2, then damage self by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Skellige women are wild and unpredictable. All units are to treat them as serious threats and never underestimate their capabilities. - General Directive to the Invading Forces of the Imperial Armada

name: Dimun Light Longship
ability:
Zeal. Order (Ranged): Damage self and an enemy unit by 1.
Cooldown: 1
ability_html: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Damage self and an enemy unit by 1. Cooldown: 1
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: Escape them? In the waters of Skellige? Good luck.

name: Tuirseach Invader
ability:
Veil.
Veteran.
ability_html: Veil. Veteran.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Veteran: At the start of the second and third round, increase the base power of this unit by 1.
flavor: Mother of four, ya sayeth? Well, then she shouldst been smarter than running 'round with an axe.

name: Drummond Berserker
ability:
At the end of your turn, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1. 
Berserk 3: Transform into a Bear Abomination.
ability_html: At the end of your turn, damage self and a random enemy unit by 1. Berserk 3: Transform into a Bear Abomination.
keyword_html: Berserk: Trigger this ability whenever power is equal to or lower than the specified amount.
flavor: Tis but a scratch, aye?

name: Brokvar Hunter
ability:
Zeal. Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1.
Cooldown: 2
Whenever you play a Beast, reduce the Cooldown by 1.
ability_html: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Damage a unit by 1. Cooldown: 2 Whenever you play a Beast, reduce the Cooldown by 1.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game on Spikeroog…

name: An Craite Blacksmith
ability:
Order: Boost an allied unit by 1.
Charge: 1
Whenever you play a Warrior, gain 1 Charge.
ability_html: Order: Boost an allied unit by 1. Charge: 1 Whenever you play a Warrior, gain 1 Charge.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: Remember me words – a good shield can save yer life.

name: Brokvar Archer
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by the number of damaged units your opponent controls.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by the number of damaged units your opponent controls.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces? Me, too. In a storm.

name: Svalblod Ravager
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Also give it Bleeding (2).
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by 2. Bloodthirst 2: Also give it Bleeding (2).
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Bleeding: Status that damages the unit by 1 at the end of its turn. Note: Bleeding turns can accumulate, 1 turn of Bleeding cancels out 1 turn of Vitality. Bleeding ignores armor.
flavor: A two-handed axe? Seems no one told him that.

name: Dimun Pirate Captain
ability:
Deploy (Bloodthirst 2): Gain Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Charges: 3
ability_html: Deploy (Bloodthirst 2): Gain Zeal. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charges: 3
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: Haul together, hoist the colors high!

name: Heymaey Herbalist
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 3 and boost it by 3.
ability_html: Deploy (Ranged): Heal an allied unit by 3 and boost it by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
flavor: We don't burn cunning women in Skellige - we take their advice.
